The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 February is 3,503,699 (6,224.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 06 February, there were 109,543 new confirmed cases (194.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 January, there were 147,081 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 26% (37,538 fewer cases).
